cards.title: Ashuoj, the Sealed Evil
body: {AshuojSealedEvil} enters play wtih 5HP
{AshuojSealedEvil} is indestructible as long as they have at least 1 HP
While there are 3 or more environment relics in play, {AshuojSealedEvil} is immune to damage from villains.
At the start of the environment turn, {AshuojSealedEvil} deals the Hero target with the highest HP {H} infernal damage.
At the end of the environemt turn, if there are 3 or more environment relics in play, restore {AshuojSealedEvil} to full HP.

cards.title: Sword of Ashuoj
body: At the end of the environment turn, if {AshuojSealedEvil} is in play, they deal the non-demon, non-relic target with the highest HP {H}-2 Fire damage and {H}-2 Infernal damage.

cards.title: Shield of Ashuoj
body: Reduce damage dealt to {AshuojSealedEvil} and Relics by 1.

cards.title: Helm of Ashuoj
body: At the end of the environment turn, if {AshuojSealedEvil} is in play, they deal all non-demon, non-relic targets 1 Lightning damage.

cards.title: Armor of Ashuoj
body: Reduce damage dealt to {AshuojSealedEvil} by 2.

cards.title: Brimstone
body: At the start of the environment turn, a hero may destory 1 Equipment. If they do, destroy {Brimstone}.
At the end of the environment turn, {Brimstone} deals the target with the 2nd highest HP {H-2} Infernal damage.

cards.title: Hellfire
body: At the start of the environment turn, a hero may have {Hellfire} deal them 3 Fire damage. If they do, destroy {Hellfire}.
At the end of the environment turn, {Hellfire} deals all targets 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Infernal Summons
body: At the start of the environment turn, if there are any demons or relics in play, destory {InfernalSummons}
At the end of the environment turn, reveal the top card of the environment deck. If it is a relic or demon, play it.

cards.title: Scavenger Imp
body: At the start of the environment turn, if the top card of the environment trash is a relic, put it into play.

cards.title: Infuser Imp
body: At the start of the environment turn, all relics and demons regain 1 HP.
At the end of the environment turn, {InfuserImp} deals all non-demon, non-relic targets 1 Infernal damage

cards.title: Demon Hunter
body: At the start of the environment turn, each demon deals {DemonHunter} 1 Infernal damage.
At the end of the environment turn, {DemonHunter} deals the demon target with the highest HP 5 radiant damage
